description:
Midousuji leaps into first with a desperate diving turn. More than 200 meters behind in the final stages of the race, Sohoku chases after Midousuji on the Naruko Super Express` final trip. Even as Naruko`s consciousness fades, he throws away everything to reduce his weight, and Sakamichi realizes there`s no way the three of them will finish together anymore. Imaizumi and Naruko express their gratitude for Naruko`s resolve. Naruko accepts their thanks and uses the last of his strength to ride with determination!
Source: crunchyroll
